mapper.select: select * from t_orderdetail t where 1=1 order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from (select 1 from t_orderdetail t where 1=1 ) a

SELECT od.productID,sum(od.number) productSellCount FROM t_order o,t_orderdetail od,t_product p where o.id=od.orderid and p.id=od.productID and o.paystatus='y' and o.createdate >= '2014-01-24 18:18:08' and o.createdate <= '2014-02-24 18:18:08' group by od.productID order by productSellCount desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_orderdetail ( id ,orderID ,productID ,price ,number ) values ( id ,#{orderID} ,#{productID} ,#{price} ,#{number} )
mapper.update: update t_orderdetail set id=#{id} ,orderID=#{orderID} ,productID=#{productID} ,price=#{price} ,number=#{number} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_orderdetail t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select * from t_orderdetail t where 1=1 and id=#{id} and t.orderID=${orderID} order by id
mapper.delete: delete from t_orderdetail where 1=1 and id=#{id}
